                 int quantity)

        item - the IDish you want to remove
        quantity - to amount of item to remove Removes a order from the provived table

      • setOrderAsProcessed

        void setOrderAsProcessed(int table,
                         IDish item)
        Parameters:
        table - The table whose orders you want to update
        item - The item you want to update Set the provided order as processed. More formally, this method sets the number of processed items to the value of the ordered items. You cannot specify the amount of processed items.

      • getOrders

        Parameters:
        table - the table of whih you want the orders
        Returns:
        a map representing all the orders Provides all the orders of the selected table

      • resetTable

        Returns:
        the number of present tables
